name: Carrier to Carrier Telecom
overview:
C2C is a full-service telecommunications provider based in the Netherlands and was founded in 1999. C2C is equally at home at providing specialised satellite telecommunications solutions as well as in terrestrial solutions, globally. C2C designs, builds as well as operate solutions and networks in accordance with customer specifications and delivers a high-end reliable end-to-end product.

C2C has a customer base comprising of blue chip corporations, telecommunication solution providers, government organisations and telecom operators. Given the profile of C2C’s customers and their requirements a very high premium is placed on security. C2C holds high level security clearance awarded by appropriate organisations. C2C is a focussed customer-centric company with a reputation of being quality driven. Customers contract with C2C because individual attention is given to each and every network it runs on a 24/7/365 basis. The C2C footprint encapsulates Europe, the Middle East, Africa and Russia and has partnerships to address customers requirements in the United States of America.

acquisition.source_description: Globecomm Acquires Carrier to Carrier Telecom BV and Assets of Evolution Communication Ltd.
